question: How can we compensate for the fasts and salaat we missed many years ago?
answer:
QUESTION
1)because i did not know much about islam when i was 12 (the time i became mature)till only recently (im now 19), i missed out on salaats and fasts. how can i make up for them. also, the fasts i missed out during the time of my periods, i thought i could make up for them by giving money to the poor, until recently i read from your site that a women cannot do that.so what am i suppose to do now cos in all those years i gave moeny to the poor and now i dont even know how many fasts i have missed out altogther. 2)how is it possible for a women to make up the salaats she missed during her periods. it would make her tired and worn out,and u may say she can make some of them up on different days, but by then, her period will be due again, so as the days go by,the number of missed salaats will go up again and again, making it even more difficult for her to make up for them.
